title: bolgoda river front 2 storied luxuary house in moratuwa
details: Architect designed 2 storied beautiful luxuary house for sale near bolgoda river.Only 1 km to moratuwa town..20 feet wide roads,highly residential, with respectable neighbourhood. Large living,dinning,pantry and wet kitchen..5 bed rooms with balconies ,some are with panoramic views of bolgoda river, large open areas facing the river,roof top ,maids room and bath room,store room, car porch for two vehicles .parapet walls and remote roller shutters, over head water tank,cctv, e.t.c........
